attributes.action: Recognise dedication of NHS staff by paying registration fees this year
attributes.background: Most health care professionals have to pay an annual registration fee to their professional body to enable them to practice. The government should refund NHS and military staff in recognition of the extraordinary effort being made during the Covid 19 Pandemic.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300073

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
